name: @pluginsdotdev/style-types
description: Plugins.dev lets you allow users to safely add 3rd party plugins to your site. This is the package that provides style types.
author: Adam Berger <adam@plugins.dev>

scripts.test: tsc --module commonjs && rollup --config rollup.config.ts && npx jest
scripts.build: tsc --module commonjs && npm run gen-flow-types && rollup --config rollup.config.ts
scripts.gen-flow-types: for i in $(find dist/types/ -type f -name "*.d.ts"); do echo "${i}"; npx flowgen "$i" --output-file "dist/lib/${i##dist/types/}.js.flow"; done
scripts.build-docs: typedoc --out docs --target es6 --theme minimal --mode file src
